# Flaming (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
Upon command, a *flaming* weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra 1d6 points of fire damage on a successful hit. The fire does not harm the wielder. The effect remains until another command is given.

Moderate evocation; CL 10th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]] and *[[Flame Blade (Spell)|flame blade]]*, *[[Flame Strike (Spell)|flame strike]]*, or *[[Fireball (Spell)|fireball]]*; Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 470
